totalAmount,
containerCount,

version, CREATEDTIME, CREATEDID, CREATEDCODE, CREATEDNAME, LASTMODIFYTIME, LASTMODIFYID, LASTMODIFYCODE, LASTMODIFYNAME,

mapper.update:
update db_proxy.sardine_shipbill
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
totalCaseQty = #{totalCaseQty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
totalVolume = #{totalVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
totalWeight = #{totalWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
totalAmount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
containerCount = #{containerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
customerCount = #{customerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LASTMODIFYTIME = #{lastModifyInfo.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LASTMODIFYID = #{lastModifyInfo.operator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTMODIFYCODE = #{lastModifyInfo.operator.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTMODIFYNAME = #{lastModifyInfo.operator.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version, jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} + 1
UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and version = #{version,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}

mapper.update: update db_proxy.sardine_shipbillcustomeritem set ORDERNO = ( select max(concat_ws('-',l.CODE,lc.LINEORDER)) from db_proxy.sardine_serialarchline l, db_proxy.sardine_serialarchlinecustomer lc where l.UUID = lc.SERIALARCHLINEUUID and l.COMPANYUUID = #{companyUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lc.CUSTOMERUUID = CUSTOMERUUID) where SHIPBILLUUID = #{shipBillUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
